fear.long: Passive. Enemies within 6" suffer -1 die on Morale tests.

terror.long: Passive. When enemy first engages, they must test Morale or become Shaken. Once per round per enemy.

dread.long: Passive. Enemies within 6" suffer -1 die on Morale and cannot ignore Shaken.

intimidate.long: Main Action. Force Morale test on enemy within 6" and LoS. No effect on Titans.

rally.long: Main Action. Remove Shaken from friendly within 6"; they gain +1 die on next Morale test.

terrifying_presence.short: Nearby enemies test Morale on kills.
terrifying_presence.long: Passive. When reducing enemy to 0 Quality, all enemies within 6" must test Morale.

unnerving.long: Passive. Engaged enemies suffer -1 die on all attacks.

panic_wave.long: Reactive. When enemy within 6" Panics or Dies, choose another enemy within 6" to test Morale.

fearless.long: Passive. Ignores Fear, Terror, and Dread. Still tests Morale for Damage and Terrain.

cowardice.long: Passive. Enemies failing Morale within 6" suffer -1 die on their next Action.

inspire.long: Passive. Friendly units within 6" gain +1 to Morale checks.

unshakable.long: Passive. Auto-passes all Morale checks. Ignores Dread effects.

skittish.long: Passive. This model must test Morale the first time each round an enemy model enters within 6".

audio_suppression.long: Passive. Enemies within 6" suffer -1 to Morale checks.

authority.long: Passive. Friendly units within 6" ignore Suppression effects.
